lines.transliteration: ul-tu šip-ri E₂.GAL-ia u₂-qat-tu-u₂ aš-šur EN GAL DINGIR.MEŠ u₃ {d}IŠ.TAR.MEŠ a-ši-bu-ut KUR aš-šur{KI} i-na qer-bi-ša₂
lines.gloss: after work palace finish 1 lord great god and goddess inhabitant land Assyria in interior

lines.transliteration: aq-re-ma {UDU}SISKUR.MEŠ taš-ri-ih-ti aq-qi₂-ma u₂-šat-lim kad₃-ra-a-a I₃.GIŠ {GIŠ}ser₂-di u₃ hi-bi-iš-ti u₂-raq-qa-a
lines.gloss: invite offering glorification make (an offering) grant generously present oil olive tree and crushed pieces (of aromatic wood) process oil

lines.transliteration: a-na ru-uš-te i-na taš-ri-it E₂.GAL ša ba-hu-la-te KUR-ia u₂-ša₂-aš₂-qa-a muh-ha-ši-in GEŠTIN.MEŠ
lines.gloss: to (a fine quality of oil) during inauguration palace of men land soak skull wine

lines.transliteration: du-uš-šu-pu ṣur-ra-šin am-kir i-na qi₂-bit aš-šur a-bu DINGIR.MEŠ u₃ {d}iš-tar šar-ra-ti {d}ALAD dum-qi₂
lines.gloss: sweetened interior water at command 1 father god and 1 queen protective deity goodness

lines.transliteration: {d}LAMMA dum-qi₂ qe₂-reb E₂.GAL ša₂-a-tu da-a-riš liš-tab-ru-u₂ a-a ip-par-ku-u₂ i-da-a-ša₂
lines.gloss: (a type of sphinx) goodness interior palace that for ever endure not leave side

akkadian_words.gw: son of Sennacherib and king of Babylon
